name: Racing Car Drive 2018
description: Enjoy the racing in extreme situations. The highway gives you the amazing and most satisfying traffic escape experience which you would never learn in any driving school. Racing Car Drive 2018 is starting on the endless busy roads and on the highway. You have to be very careful. Highways and roads are ubiquitous with high-speed racing cars. Only experienced and professional racers can perfectly avoid all the vehicles on the road.You have to be experienced enough to face all exciting challenges in this Racing Car Drive 2018 games
